meanings.definition: A type of ancient Roman boxing glove.
meanings.sent1: The gladiator wore caestuses during the fierce battle.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various caestuses used by Roman fighters.
meanings.sent3: In the historical reenactment, the actor comically struggled to put on the caestuses.
meanings.sent4: His fists felt like caestuses, ready to punch through any obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The leather caestuses were adorned with intricate designs, showcasing the craftsmanship of the era.
